items.clinical_text: How many panic and limited symptoms attacks did you have during the week?

scoring.0: No panic or limited symptom episodes
scoring.1: Mild: no full panic attacks and no more than 1 limited symptom attack/day
scoring.2: Moderate: 1 or 2 full panic attacks and/or multiple limited symptom attacks/day
scoring.3: Severe: more than 2 full attacks but not more than 1/day on average
scoring.4: Extreme: full panic attacks occurred more than once a day, more days than not

items.clinical_text: If you had any panic attacks during the past week, how distressing (uncomfortable, frightening) were they while they were happening?

scoring.0: Not at all distressing, or no panic or limited symptom attacks during the past week
scoring.4: Extremely distressing (extreme distress during all attacks)

items.clinical_text: During the past week, how much have you worried or felt anxious about when your next panic attack would occur or about fears related to the attacks?
hooks: fear of health problems from attacks

scoring.3: Very often or to a very disturbing degree
scoring.4: Nearly constantly and to a disabling extent

items.clinical_text: During the past week were there any places or situations you avoided, or felt afraid of, because of fear of having a panic attack?

scoring.1: Mild: occasional fear and/or avoidance; little or no modification of lifestyle
scoring.2: Moderate: noticeable fear and/or avoidance but still manageable; some lifestyle modification
scoring.3: Severe: extensive avoidance; substantial modification of lifestyle required
scoring.4: Extreme: pervasive disabling fear and/or avoidance; extensive lifestyle modification

items.clinical_text: During the past week, were there any activities that you avoided, or felt afraid of, because they caused physical sensations like those you feel during panic attacks?

scoring.0: No fear or avoidance of situations or activities because of distressing physical sensations
scoring.1: Mild: occasional fear and/or avoidance; little lifestyle modification
scoring.2: Moderate: noticeable avoidance but still manageable; limited lifestyle modification
scoring.3: Severe: extensive avoidance; substantial modification of lifestyle or interference in functioning
scoring.4: Extreme: pervasive and disabling avoidance; important tasks not performed

items.clinical_text: During the past week, how much did the above symptoms altogether interfere with your ability to work or carry out your responsibilities at home?
hooks: trouble with chores due to anxiety

scoring.0: No interference with work or home responsibilities
scoring.1: Slight interference; could do nearly everything
scoring.2: Significant interference; still could manage to do the things I needed to do
scoring.3: Substantial impairment; many important things I couldn't do
scoring.4: Extreme, incapacitating impairment; essentially unable to manage responsibilities

items.clinical_text: During the past week, how much did panic and limited symptom attacks, worry about attacks and fear of situations and activities because of attacks interfere with your social life?

scoring.1: Slight interference with social activities; could do nearly everything
scoring.2: Significant interference; could manage most things if I made the effort
scoring.3: Substantial impairment; many social things I couldn't do
scoring.4: Extreme, incapacitating impairment; hardly anything social I could do
